build-stenciljs-to-react:development.command: rm -rf apps/react-app/src/app/components/custom; nx run frontend-stenciljs:build --configuration=development; cp -R apps/frontend-stenciljs/dist apps/react-app/src/app/components/custom

build-stenciljs-to-react:prod.command: rm -rf apps/react-app/src/app/components/custom; nx run frontend-stenciljs:build --configuration=production; cp -R apps/frontend-stenciljs/dist apps/react-app/src/app/components/custom

build-stenciljs-to-angular:development.command: rm -rf apps/angular-app/src/app/components/custom/dist; nx run frontend-stenciljs:build --configuration=development; cp -R apps/frontend-stenciljs/dist apps/angular-app/src/app/components/custom

build-stenciljs-to-angular:prod.command: rm -rf apps/angular-app/src/app/components/custom/dist; nx run frontend-stenciljs:build --configuration=production; cp -R apps/frontend-stenciljs/dist apps/angular-app/src/app/components/custom

build-stenciljs-to-all:development.command: npx nx run nx-assurance-code:stenciljs-custom-commands:build-stenciljs-to-react:development; npx nx run nx-assurance-code:stenciljs-custom-commands:build-stenciljs-to-angular:development; npx nx run angular-app:build:development; npx nx run @org/react-app:build

build-stenciljs-to-all:prod.command: npx nx run nx-assurance-code:stenciljs-custom-commands:build-stenciljs-to-react:prod; npx nx run nx-assurance-code:stenciljs-custom-commands:build-stenciljs-to-angular:prod; npx nx run angular-app:build:production; npx nx run @org/react-app:build
